content.rendered:
*Currently on special offer until 31st May 2023, until stocks last* *Normally £325 each *

Our Azure Budget Bistro Set is similar in style to our standard Azure range, but at a cheaper price point.

The Azure Budget Bistro Set features 2 chairs and 1 square table. Made from solid chestnut wood & a black powder coated steel frame, the Azure Budget Bistro Set can be used indoors or outdoors.

With a steel frame & solid wood, the Azure Budget Bistro Set has extreme durability, perfect for commercial venues.

Dimensions in mm:

Chair H 840 x W 380 x D 320 x SH 460 – 5.7KG each.

Table H 720 x W 600 x D 600 – 17.7KG each.
